DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of the antihypertensive drugs in the control of emergence blood pressure after tumor resection craniotomy; compared between labetalol (Avexa) and diltiazem (Herbessor). Also the investigators seek to determine the effective dose of the antihypertensive drugs and their side effects in Thai population.
DOC.brief_title: Control of Emergence Blood Pressure During Craniotomy for Tumor Surgery Between Labetolol and Diltiazem
DOC.detailed_description: The study was randomized equivalence trial
DOC.criteria: patients who scheduled for craniotomy for tomor removal allergic to labetalol or diltiazem Bradycardia < 60 beat/min Second or third degree heart block Severe asthma or severe COPD Brain stem tumor
DOC.keyword: Hypertension during the emergence after craniotomy
